name: HYPER*GOBLIN*FORTUNE*TELLER
description:
CONTROLS: 

CLICK ON THE GAME AND PRESS RIGHT TO DRAW A CARD

*

Obtain cosmic Goblin Guidance from your local HYPER*GOBLIN*FORTUNE*TELLER using guaranteed genuine Goblin Tarot Cards .

*

This Fortune Teller was created for the Tarot Bitsy Jam.

*

In addition, download the complete major arcana PDF guidebook to the HYPER*GOBLIN*TAROT below.

(Tarot cards not included)
